alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion; Newton; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 21 at 3:25PM CDT until May 21 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Southwestern Marion County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Boone County in north central Arkansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Carver, or 9 miles east of Jasper, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Western Grove... Dugger... Piercetown... Carver... Crawford... Everton... St. Joe... Pindall... Yardelle... Vendor... Eros... Hasty... Mt Judea... Bruno... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
